images.altText: Desk with chair and computer monitor

content.heading: A quick overview
subHeadings: Successful delivery of projects through collaboration
Learning throughout my software engineering journey
text: I have over three years of experience developing large, scalable enterprise APIs for two Fortune 500 companies and am very passionate about my work
I’m skilled in developing web applications using JavaScript, Java, Python, SQL, MongoDB, and Google Cloud
Whether the team’s big or small, through collaboration and leadership, I have contributed to the timely and successful delivering of projects of various shapes and sizes
I enjoy learning the latest technologies, taking part in technology events, and applying new knowledge to my work

content.heading: A tale of two passions, art and technology
text: Growing up, two of my interests were art and technology. I enjoyed creating objects with Lego, folding origami, and designing architectural structures. At the same time, I was fascinated with the inner workings of websites and was very enthusiastic about developing my own.

Today, as a software engineer, I get to combine my two passions as part of the software development process — putting on my artist cap when designing user interfaces and applying my interest in technology while programming applications using the latest technologies.

content.heading: Full stack development expertise
subHeadings: Building modern and responsive user interfaces
Designing and developing robust and scalable backend APIs
Deploying to the cloud with the latest technologies
text: Proficient in designing responsive web applications with Figma and developing them with modern JavaScript using React and its ecosystem of tools and packages, like Redux
Experienced in developing large-scale microservices using various backend frameworks and technologies, like Spring Boot and Flask, and testing APIs using frameworks, such as JUnit and Karate
Knowledgable in developing and deploying applications using Google Cloud Platform and cloud-native technologies, such as Kubernetes
Web-based todo list with a simple user interface. Features include creating, removing, and searching todos.
Minimalistic social networking Android application. Users can view and create posts, which are saved to a Parse database.
